children.name: slide
children.description: Fires when the user drags the drag handle to a new position.

children.name: change
children.description: Fires when the slider value changes as a result of selecting a new value with the drag handle, buttons or keyboard.

children.name: resize
children.description: Adjusts the Slider layout to match the size of the container.

children.name: value

parameters.name: value `Number`
parameters.description: _optional, default: _The value to be set for a Slider.

children.description: Gets or sets the value of a **Slider**. It accepts a string or number as parameters and returnsa number representing the underlying value.

children.name: enable

parameters.name: enable `Boolean`
parameters.description: The argument, which defines whether to enable/disable the **Slider**.

children.description: Enable/Disable the **Slider** widget.

children.name: destroy
children.description: Prepares the **Slider** for safe removal from the DOM.Detaches event handlers and removes data entries in order to avoid memory leaks.

children.name: value
children.description: The underlying value of the **Slider**.

children.name: tooltip.template
children.description: Template of the tooltip. The following variables are passed by the Slider and are ready to be used inside the template:*   **value** - the current value when using a regular slider*   **selectionStart** and **selectionEnd** - the current values when using a range slider

children.name: tooltip.format
Example - set format according to the precision

children.description: Format string for the text of the tooltip. Note: The appliedformat will also influence the appearance of the **Slider**tick labels.The slider widget supports precision of up-to 10 digits after the decimals point.

children.name: tooltip.enabled
children.description: Disables (**false**) or enables (**true**) the tooltip ofthe **Slider**.

children.name: tooltip
children.description: Configuration of the **Slider** tooltip.

children.name: tickPlacement
children.description: Denotes the location of the tick marks in the **Slider**. The available options are:* topLeft - Tick marks are located on the top of the horizontal widget or on the left of  the vertical widget.* bottomRight - Tick marks are located on the bottom of the horizontal widget or on the  right side of the vertical widget.* both - Tick marks are located on both sides of the widget.* none - Tick marks are not visible.

children.name: smallStep
children.description: The small step value of the **Slider**. Must be a positive number, otherwise an Javascript exception will be thrown.The small step value determines the amount of Slider value change when the end user* clicks on the increase or decrease buttons of the **Slider**;* presses the arrow keys (the drag handle must be focused);* drags the drag handle.

children.name: showButtons
children.description: Can be used to show (**true**) or hide (**false**) theincrease and decrease buttons of a **Slider**.

children.name: orientation
children.description: The orientation of a **Slider**: **"horizontal"** or **"vertical"**.

children.name: min
children.description: The minimum value of the **Slider**.

children.name: max
children.description: The maximum value of the **Slider**.

children.name: largeStep
children.description: The delta with which the value will change when the user presses the Page Up or Page Down key (the draghandle must be focused). Note: `largeStep` will also set a large tick for every large step.Must be a positive number, larger than [smallStep](#configuration-smallStep).

children.name: increaseButtonTitle
children.description: The title of the increase button of the **Slider**.

children.name: decreaseButtonTitle
children.description: The title of the decrease button of the **Slider**.
